articles.title: AI 'godfather' Geoffrey Hinton warns machines may outthink humans in years
articles.summary: Geoff Hinton warns artificial intelligence could surpass humans within years, not decades, and recommends a focus on creating maternal instincts in machines.
articles.translated_title: AI 'godfather' Geoffrey Hinton warns machines may outthink humans in years
articles.translated_summary: Geoff Hinton warns artificial intelligence could surpass humans within years, not decades, and recommends a focus on creating maternal instincts in machines.

articles.title: Illinois law bans AI use to provide mental health advice
articles.summary: Illinois recently passed a law that prohibits the use of artificial intelligence for mental health interactions or decisions.
articles.translated_title: Illinois law bans AI use to provide mental health advice

articles.title: Elon Musk's xAI loses co-founder Igor Babuschkin for venture firm
articles.summary: Igor Babuschkin, who helped start xAI in 2023, said in a post on X that he's leaving the artificial intelligence startup to launch his own venture firm.
articles.translated_title: Elon Musk's xAI loses co-founder Igor Babuschkin for venture firm
articles.translated_summary: Igor Babuschkin, who helped start xAI in 2023, said in a post on X that he's leaving the artificial intelligence startup to launch his own venture firm.

articles.title: YouTube to begin testing a new AI-powered age verification system in the US
articles.summary: YouTube on Wednesday will begin testing a new age-verification system in the U.S. that relies on artificial intelligence to differentiate between adults and minors, based on the kinds of videos that they have been watching.
articles.translated_title: YouTube to begin testing a new AI-powered age verification system in the US

articles.title: Meta’s ‘superintelligence’ isn’t here yet. But its AI bets are already paying off
articles.summary: If Meta investors had concerns about the company’s huge spending on artificial intelligence infrastructure and talent — and its ambitious “superintelligence” goal — they’re likely to be assuaged by its blockbuster earnings report on Wednesday. The results, as one analyst put it, indicates that “AI is becoming a real revenue driver, not just hype.”
articles.translated_title: Meta’s ‘superintelligence’ isn’t here yet. But its AI bets are already paying off

articles.title: YouTube will start using AI to guess your age. If it’s wrong, you’ll have to prove it
articles.summary: New York (CNN) — YouTube will begin guessing users’ ages using artificial intelligence on Wednesday, as part of an effort to prevent kids from accessing inappropriate content online.
articles.translated_title: YouTube will start using AI to guess your age. If it’s wrong, you’ll have to prove it

articles.title: Miffed Musk plans Apple lawsuit
articles.summary: Billionaire SpaceX, Tesla and X owner Elon Musk says he plans to sue Apple for not featuring X and its Grok artificial intelligence chatbot app in its top recommended apps in its App Store.
articles.translated_summary: Billionaire SpaceX, Tesla and X owner Elon Musk says he plans to sue Apple for not featuring X and its Grok artificial intelligence chatbot app in its top recommended apps in its App Store.
